label: 弾正台
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Board in charge of keeping customs, pure, impeaching officials, reporting misdemeanors of persons of the Fifth Rank (Go-i) and above, conducting the cross-examinations of persons of the Sixth Rank (Roku-i) and below.
